page.title: 13LEISURE IN STOW
page.content: {Gardening}is probably the most common leisure activity whether through necessity or for enjoyment.{Home {maintenance}also keeps many people busy. Stow has a popular{Rugby Football Club and the{Stow Rovers}play with a round ball.{Jogging}or even more serious {running}has quite a strong following. The Stow Players are an{amateur {dramatic society. Stow singers}provide a concert two or three times a year. { Guides, Brownies}and{Cubs}cater for youngsters while the{British Legion Club and the seven public houses provide for their elders. {The Baptist Church}also provides for the young people with{Christian {Endeavour}and a music group, while the adult church members have their house groups during the week. A new{youth club}is about to be built.
